function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(

Motor Trend Waterproof Car Seat Covers for Front Seats – Padded Neoprene with Two-Tone Stitching, Easy to Install Automotive Seat Covers, Universal Fit for Cars Trucks Vans and SUVs, Gray Stitching. Universal fit design for pick-up trucks, hatchback sedans and most other types of car, truck, van & SUV. Also works great as a baby, pet, or dog seat cover. Perfect car accessories for rideshare drivers too!
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior. Bucket seats dimensions-Back Height-2 feet. Width-1 feet 9 inch. Bottom Length(fr. the back)-1 feet 6 inch Width-1 feet 10 inch
WATERPROOF LINING – Have peace of mind knowing that your seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. We use a waterproof neoprene foam lining on the inside of our seat protectors for maximum protection against spills.
MODERN DESIGN – Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set
EASY TO INSTALL – The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the head rest covers.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Our front seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.



Motor Trend SpillGuard Waterproof Car Seat Covers

Front Seats Only

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior.

Modern Design

Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set!

Details

  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Breathable materials for maximum comfort during your commute.
  • Waterproof neoprene foam lining repels water and other liquids.
  • Universal Fit for Most Vehicles.
  • Easy to Install.

Read more




Refresh the Look of Your Interior

These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Easily refresh the look of your interior in minutes.

Sideless Designs for Built-In Armrests

Our universal seat covers are fully compatible with side airbags and armrests. Universal fit for most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUV. Please check dimensions before installation.

Waterproof Neoprene Lining

Have peace of mind knowing that your front seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. Waterproof neoprene foam lines the inside of our covers to provide maximum protection.

Read more


Made for Auto Enthusiasts

Motor Trend offers only high-quality premium products designed to protect and enhance your car or truck.

Read more

The newest from Motor Trend: 3 layer waterproof car seat covers feature a soft polyester cloth outer layer with waterproof neoprene backing. Behind these layers is a patented non-slip backing which both reinforces and prevents tearing, while also keeping the cover in place and preventing slippage.
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our front seat covers offer protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle while also refreshing the look of your interior.
WATERPROOF LINING – Have peace of mind knowing that your seats are protected in the case of an accidental spill. We use a waterproof neoprene foam lining on the inside of our seat protectors for maximum protection against spills.
MODERN DESIGN – Our universal fit seat covers feature a modern ‘side-less ‘design that is fully compatible with any built-in airbags and armrests found in newer vehicles. No modifications required, simply install and you’re all set!

Motor Trend AquaShield Car Seat Covers

Specially selected for maximum comfort during your daily commute, we use a lightweight Poly blend outer material that offers a high level of ventilation.

Universal Fit

Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.

CAT MeshFlex Car Seat Covers for Front Seats – Automotive Seat Covers for Cars Trucks and SUVs, Universal Fit Design with Comfortable Mesh Back and Seat.
DURABLE PROTECTION – From the work site to your home base, CAT Car Seat Covers offers dependable protection against wear and tear for your automobile. The modern styling also helps to refresh the look of your interior by covering up old, worn-out seats
BREATHEABLE MESH – Specially-selected materials help to provide maximum comfort during your daily commute. The honeycomb mesh back and seat of our covers provide enhanced ventilation so that you stay cool and comfortable during your drive
MEASUREMENTS: Head rest – Length: 11 inches, Width: 9 inches; Bucket seats – Back – Height: 2ft., Width: 1ft. 9 inches; Bottom – Length (from the back): 1ft. 6 inches, Width: 1ft. 10 inches
AIRBAG COMPATIBLE – We use a unique side stitching technique along the outside edge of each seat cover. This stitching is designed to release whenever the side airbag deploys to allow for interference-free operation of built-in safety features
EASY TO INSTALL – With a universal fit design and easy-to-follow installation image, our CAT Front Seat Covers can be setup in your vehicle within minutes.  Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit
FORM FITTING DESIGN – CAT Automotive Seat Covers are designed to fit most vehicles with removable headrests. Our form-fitting design conforms to the contours of your seats using anchor bars that are built into the covers themselves, providing a snug fit in nearly in vehicle

Read more

Product Features:

EASY TO INSTALL

CAT Automotive Seat Covers are designed to fit most vehicles with removable headrests. Our form-fitting design conforms to the contours of your seats using anchor bars that are built into the covers themselves, providing a snug fit in nearly in vehicle.

SIDE AIRBAG COMPATIBLE

We use a unique side stitching technique along the outside edge of each seat cover. This stitching is designed to release whenever the side airbag deploys to allow for interference-free operation of built-in safety features.

BREATHABLE MESH OUTER

Specially selected materials help to provide maximum comfort during your daily commute. The honeycomb mesh back and seat of our covers provide enhanced ventilation so that you stay cool and comfortable during your drive.

Read more

Product Benefits:

TOTAL PROTECTION

With a universal size and high-quality materials, our front seat covers provide durable protection against every day wear and tear.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN

Designed with comfort in mind, the breathable mesh outer helps you to stay cool and comfortable during while you drive.

HEAVY DUTY

Caterpillar Automotive Accessories delivers high-quality, durable products designed to handle whatever the road might bring you.

Read more

From the brand

Lusso Gear Family Favorites

Auto Organization Caddy: A multifunctional car and trunk organizer will help you declutter your floor and passenger seats. This foldable backseat automobile holder gives extra storage to any car in a matter of seconds.
9 Storage Pockets: These Car Organizers offer 2 spacious main bag areas, 1 secure rear zipper pocket, 4 built-in cup holders, and 2 additional front-facing mesh pockets to keep any car interior, console or carseat organized.
Secure Safety Handles: The Lusso Gear Car Organizer comes equipped with a set of 2 handles, comfy enough for small and large hands. Your car’s side and middle seat belts can be clipped through for extra road safety.
Driver’s Best Friend: The uses are endless. Use as a toy or snack tray, a mobile office, or for storing police gear. This collapsible car seat storage organizer can do almost anything.
Built to Last a Lifetime: Every Lusso Gear accessory proudly comes with a lifetime warranty. If you encounter any issue with your Lusso Gear Organizer, simply let us know. We’ll work with you to make it right.

Easy-Carry Handles

Two ergonomic carry handles make it simple to bring the Lusso Gear Car organizer (and everything inside it) just about anywhere.

Collapsible Design

Organizer folds flat in an instant thanks to a space-saving design, allowing for easier transport and convenient storage when not in use.

Secure Safety Straps

Convenient straps allow you to safely and securely clip your organizer into your vehicle seat belt so it stays in place, even during sudden unexpected stops.

(as of Nov 29,2022 01:57:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Why We Use Car Seat Gap Filler Organizer

How Paffenery Car Seat Gap Organizer Can Assist Your Ride

Cable Slot

The cable slot design of car seat gap filler organizer makes the messy charging cable placed in an orderly manner and will not be entangled with other items.

Organizer Dividers

The 2 divider pieces included with the gap organizer are removable and relocatable over two pre-designed insertion slots, making the storage space personalized and even more easier to access your desired items.

Optional Elastic Filler

The adjustable elastic filler for the car seat gap filler increases the stability. Put up to 5 pieces of them to fill up the gap space of your car seat. The car seat gap organizer of this design is suitable for a variety of car models.

How to Install Paffenery Car Seat Gap Filler

Step 1. Measure the gap width between your car’s center console and seat edge

Step 2. Depending on the gap width, if larger than 0.5″, put in the included elastic filler foams on one or both sides. Extra thickened fillers are also included for even larger gaps.

Step 3. Insert the seat gap organizer, if too lose or too tight, you may add-in or take-off the extra elastic filler foams as needed.

Package Includes:

2 Seat Gap Storage Boxes

2 Divider Slices

10 Elastic Fillers

Materials:

High-end ABS plastic, strong, durable, and non-toxic. Will last for years

Design Pattern:

Slim design, can take in most of personal items while not occupying too much seating space

Quality Seat Gap Filler Organizer For Any Car – Unlike standard car seat organizer that only fit seat gap of a specific width, the Paffenery between seat car organizer ensures the perfect fit in every car gap. Coming with 5 elastic sponges, the car seat gap filler fits snugly in the front car gap of most vehicle models.
Get Extra Storage Space In Your Car – Do you think your car has inadequate organizers and storage compartments? Want to keep all your little necessities in perfect order? Our seat gap organizer provides a large compartment for phones, sunglasses, wallet, credit cards, pens. And a smaller area, separated by a removable divider to secure ear pods, bills, and coins etc.
Drive Safely With Fewer Distractions – Driving with phones, keys, cables, wallets, all around your center console, floors, and car gap can be really distractive. And distracted drive is the #1 cause of traffic accidents. Our car seat organizer between seats keeps your essentials neatly organized. With Paffenery between seat gap filler, you can just focus on road and arriving home safe.
Slim Design Maximize Your Seating Comfort – If you are tired of all sorts of handbags and small plastic bags with changes, cards, or phone chargers in front of your feet, this 2 pack car storage organizer is your go-to option. With a slender, space-saving style, our car seat organizer takes virtually no leg room in the seating area, allowing you to travel with ultimate comfort.
Place Your Order With Confidence – The car organizer front seat is made of heavy-duty polypropylene material and won’t break easily like many similar car seat gap filler organizer. We will be happy to address any queries you may have about our premium front seat gap organizer within 3 hours and make your shopping experience unforgettable.

Why We Use Car Seat Gap Filler Organizer

Read more

Price: $139.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 01:06:38 UTC – Details)


Specifications: 

Color: Black,Black+Grey,Beige,Brown
Material: 3D Bright Silk Fabric
Applicable season: All seasons
Applicable models: Universal Fit

Features:
1. Auto Newer seat cover protects your original interior from damage.
2. The car seat covers provide a comfortable driving experience.
3. The 3D bright  fabric provides good ventilation.it is made of high-quality 3D bright silk material, which is completely different from the ordinary material in the market.

PACKAGE LIST:
2* Front Seat Cover(with backrest)
1* Rear Bench Cover
2* Rear Bench Backrest
4*  Headrest Cover 

Ultra-breathable Luxury 3D Bright Silk Cloth：Breathable，Dampproof,Universal Four Seasons,Insulates your body from burning hot seats in the summer and freezing cold seats during winter for a comfortable driving experience in any weather.
Compatible with 90% of the car seats: with the unique bottom elastic split design, the rear seat is very simple and fashionable, greatly enhancing the compatibility of various vehicle seat sizes.
Beautiful appearance: the hemmed design provides better protection and beauty. These car seat covers can match the car seat perfectly, even look like the new original seat. They will protect your original seat from wear and tear
Seat protection and safety: the non slip bottom is made of anti-skid high-quality suede fabric, which is not easy to move. The front seat bottom cover and the rear seat bottom cover retain the position of safety belt lock, and the unique small waist design will not hinder the use of airbag.
Easy to install: installation time is about 15 minutes, no need to lift or remove the back seat, beginners are very easy, just follow the steps of the installation video. It never slips when installed correctly.
